abstract: United Nations Security Council will vote on draft resolution creating tribunal to prosecute culprits responsible for July 2014 downing of Malaysia Airlines Flight 17; speculation regarding crash, which killed all 298 people on board, is that missile launched by pro-Russia separatists destroyed aircraft flying over Eastern Ukraine; Russia is expected to block resolution.
lead_paragraph: The jetliner is believed to have been destroyed by a surface-to-air missile fired from territory controlled by pro-Russia separatists in eastern Ukraine

headline.main: U.N. Council to Vote on Creating Tribunal On Downing of Malaysia Airlines Flight
headline.print_headline: United Nations; Council to Vote on Creating Tribunal on Downing of Malaysia Airlines Flight

snippet: The jetliner is believed to have been destroyed by a surface-to-air missile fired from territory controlled by pro-Russia separatists in eastern Ukraine
